data.title: How old was Quentin Tarantino first movie?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 2): Quentin Tarantino was born 27 March in 1963.

QT 28

He shot his first Short film “Lovebirds in Bondage” (unfinished) in 1983 when he was 20.

In 1987 he shot a comedy called “My Friend’s Birthday” when he was desperate at 24.
